internship1.title: Full-stack web internship
internship1.description: During my internship, I solved problems related to graphs and tables, optimized access rights, and made interface adjustments to improve functionality and aesthetics of the applications. I made significant visual and functional improvements using React.js, Node.js, TypeScript, SCSS, and GitLab.

internship2.title: Full-stack web internship
internship2.description: During my internship, I solved problems related to graphs and tables, optimized access rights, and made interface adjustments to improve functionality and aesthetics of the applications. I made significant visual and functional improvements using React.js, Node.js, TypeScript, SCSS, and GitLab.

chatApp.title: Chat application
chatApp.description: Developed a real-time chat application where users can quickly create an account, generate a room with a unique code, and chat with multiple participants. Focused on user-friendly design, easy setup, and smooth messaging experience.

bookingApp.title: Student booking App
bookingApp.description: Developed a student booking app that shows real-time data (apartments) from '9annas.tn' by scraping them and showing them on my website while also showing their location on the map.

ecommerceClone.title: E-commerce website clone
ecommerceClone.description: Recreated the MODECO.tn website, but better! Focusing on delivering a responsive and user-friendly interface, ensuring optimal performance across devices while maintaining a clean and modern design.

weatherApp.title: Weather App
weatherApp.description: Developed a Weather App using React.js and CSS, featuring dynamic icon and icon color changes based on the weather temperature. Focused on providing a clean and responsive design with real-time weather updates.

contact.contactText: I am always open to discuss new opportunities. Reach out if you'd like to collaborate on a project or simply say hi!

profile.name: Belhiba Tarak
profile.description: A passionate web developer specializing in web development and interested in big data and cloud.
